channel.title: Downgrade from R17 to R16
channel.description: I've got a mangOH Yellow board that I upgraded to R17. I really want to put it back to an R16 release but it is not letting me do that. Is there any way to overcome this problem?

item.title: Downgrade from R17 to R16
item.dc:creator: jyijyi
item.description:
No, I don’t think so, here says you cannot do this:

https://source.sierrawireless.com/resources/airprime/software/wp76xx/wp76xx-firmware-release-17/#sthash.IjvXB4Oo.dpbs

Probably you need to take another module for your testing

Read full topic

item.title: Downgrade from R17 to R16
item.dc:creator: philipboucherat
item.description:
I’ve got a mangOH Yellow board that I upgraded to R17. I really want to put it back to an R16 release but it is not letting me do that. Is there any way to overcome this problem?
